synopsis: Things are peaceful in Japoness, thanks in large part to Lime, Cherry, and Bloodberry. Otaru is busy organizing a festival, so he doesn't notice Lime's sudden depression. It seems that Terra II is going to stop making Marionettes now that Lorelei is back. Will everyone forget about Lime and the others?

title.jp: Wishes Are Granted to the Winner of the Float Battle

synopsis: Otaru's in charge of the Sanja festival, and it looks to be a big success. Lime, Cherry, and Bloodberry become very interested in the float race when they discover that the winner has one wish granted. Of course, they all want the same thing, to be alone with Otaru. Now, with the aid of some very high-tech floats, who will win the bid for Otaru's attention?

title.jp: Daddy is Coming! Daddy is Coming!

synopsis: Mitsuguri Hanagata's father comes to Japoness to bring his son home in order to prepare for his future as an heir of the family conglomerate. However, not wanting to be away from Otaru, Hanagata challenges his father to a wrestling match to determine his fate.

Tiger, Luchs, and Panta, once considered to be enemies, have now become friends with the Marionettes. They receive a letter from their master Faust, ordering them to leave Japoness and return to him at once. Unsure of their otome kairo's maturity level, they seek out Otaru for his advice.

Otaru and the Marionettes are asked to act as tour guides for the representatives of the 'Shriataki Alliance' visiting Japoness from all over the world. While babysitting an annoying guest, Lime, Cherry, and Bloodberry roll out on an interesting sightseeing tour. But what is the real indentity of these strange guests? And can shirataki noodles catch a thief?

title.jp: Two Otaru's? The Tightrope of Love

synopsis: Two Otaru's? The Tightrope of Love - Bloodberry is disappointed when her plans for her date with Otaru go bad. She wanders around town and finds herself in front of the circus she had planned to see with Otaru. There, she meets Akashi, a circus performer who looks identical to Otaru!

Lime meets a fairy in the forest but for some reason, only Lime can see her. Lorelei says it because only those with pure hearts like Marionettes can see fairies. But, as Lime and the fairy become good friends the time draws closer for them to say good-bye.

Cherry happens to find a capsule which contains a human baby. When she sees him, her otome kairo activates her maternal instincts and she refuses to give him up, even after she's been branded a kidnapper!

title.jp: The Forest, An Iron Ball, and Everybody

synopsis: Otaru and the girls have been asked to help build a playground, but Lime refuses when she finds out that they wish to destroy a forest in the process. While everyone else is preparing for this major construction, Lime and Gennai preapre to defend the forest alone.

Lorelei's feeling depressed since she can't leave the castle, so Otaru and the Marionettes arrange a secret picnic for her. However, before the trip even gets fully underway, disaster strikes and Lorelei disappears. As everyone searches for her, a new enemy appears...

After kidnapping Lorelei, Gettel announces to all nations of Terra II the rebirth of Gartlant. Feeling responsible for taking Lorelei out of the castle, Otaru sets out on his own to save her. However, there is an unexpected outcome that awaits him.

It appears that Faust kidnapped Lorelei, in order to find the whereabouts of the Japonessger. He orders Luchs, Panta, and Tiger to attack Otaru and the Marionettes, but none of them are sure why Faust has suddenly turned back to his evil ways, and are forced to question his orders.

title.jp: Evil Ambitions and the Rise of the Iron Beast

synopsis: Otaru and the Marionettes fight against the evil Faust, whom is about to take off on the Japonessger with Lorelei. However, a surprise ally appears and disrupts Faust's plans. But do Lime, Cherry, and Bloodberry still have time to save Lorelei?

title.jp: A Pair of Tickets for a Slow Train to Xi'an

synopsis: Otaru wins a pair of tickets to Xian, but instead of being excited, Otaru starts taking on extra jobs. The girls are angry that he hasn't made a decision about who he's going to take, but after a lot of work, Otaru is ready to decide...

Otaru, Lime, Cherry, and Bloodberry are enjoying their first visit to an exciting city in Xian. When General Chao, a famous general in Xian, realizes Otaru is the hero who saved Terra II, he greets the party with wonderful hospitality. However, on the same night, Otaru collapses with an intense fever and Hanagata rushes to the rescue with a mysterious doctor.10/

After recovering from the "Dream Fever", Otaru wakes up after sleeping for five days straight. He is shocked to learn that all three girls have suddenly disappeared after safely curing his illness, and to make matters worse, Otaru finds out he's wanted by the Xian government as a terrorist.

Otaru is determined to find Lime, Cherry, and Bloodberry even while being a wanted man. He and Hanagata happen to run into someone who says he knows a person who can help Otaru find the girls. However, this mysterious underground boss demands Otaru to fight an iron-masked warrior to the death in return for the information. Can Otaru defeat this newest foe and find the information he so desperately seeks?

Working as a nurse in Xian, Lime has become a valuable asset to the hospital and its patients. Meanwhile, Cherry is also hard at work at an orphanage where the children have become emotionally attached to her. When one of the orphans gets injured and taken to the hospital, Cherry and Lime meet and behave like complete strangers!
